ARABIC: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنتُمْ لَهَا عَٰكِفُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When he said to his father and his people, 'What are these statues you are clinging to?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When he said to his father and his people: "What are these idols to which you cling so passionately?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Recall, when he said to his father and his people: "What are these images to which you are devoutly clinging?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Abraham asked his father and his people, "What are these statues which you worship?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When he said to his father and his people, “What are these idols before whom you squat (worshipping)?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When he said to his father and his people: "What are these images to which you are devoted"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When he said to his father and his people: What are these images to whose worship you cleave?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when he said to his father and his people, 'What are these statues unto which you are cleaving?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When he said unto his father and his folk: What are these images unto which ye pay devotion?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When he asked his father and his people, "What are these images to which you are so devoted?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Recall what time he said unto his father and his people what are these images to which ye are cleaving?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when he said to his father and his people, ‘What are these images to which you keep on clinging?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold! he said to his father and his people, "What are these images, to which ye are (so assiduously) devoted?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When he said to his father and his people: "What are these images, to which you are devoted?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said to his father and to his nation: 'What, are these the statues to which you cling'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When he said to his father and his people, “What are these statues to which you are devoted?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:52] when he said to his father and his people, ‘What are these images, [these] idols, to which you [constantly] cleave?’, that is, which you are constantly worshipping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When he said unto his father) Azar (and his folk) Nimrod son of Canaan and his host: (What are these images unto which ye pay devotion) which you worship?
